title: 怎么禁止物品
author: q1356720423
txt_content:
服务器怎么禁止物品1.6.4的
ESS config里没有那个文件

replies.author: jtianweihan
replies.txt_content:
ess中 后面填序号
  blacklist:

    # Which blocks should people be prevented from placing?（不能放置）
    placement: 10,11,46,327

    # Which items should people be prevented from using?（无法使用）
    usage: 327

    # Which blocks should people be prevented from breaking?（不破坏）
    break:

    # Which blocks should not be pushed by pistons?（活塞不推）
    piston:

    # Which blocks should not be dispensed by dispensers（发射器不扔）
    dispenser:

replies.author: 小尼大叔叔
replies.txt_content: ess可以实现 插件也可以

replies.author: q1356720423
replies.txt_content:
小尼大叔叔 发表于 2014-6-24 20:40
ess可以实现 插件也可以
ess不行

replies.txt_content:

ess中 后面填序号
  blacklist:
那个文件？

replies.author: 黑小白
replies.txt_content: 装个插件ban物品的直接输入物品就banID就ban了

replies.txt_content:
q1356720423 发表于 2014-6-24 20:56
